1.title: Play Date with Death

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Bored suburban homemaker Candy Montgomery finds herself an exciting new hobby- a salacious affair with a church friend's husband! When her lover threatens to end the relationship, a confrontation takes these families from cookie cutters to ax murder.

2.title: Southern Belle from Hell

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Kelley Cannon is the Belle of Nashville with her millionaire hubby. But Kelley devolves from debutante to drug addict after a back injury. As her family's perfect veneer shatters, the struggle to keep up appearances ends fatally.

3.title: Stay-at-Home Murder

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Susan Wright is Houston's hottest homemaker. When her hunky husband starts slipping into his party boy ways, things start to sour. They might look like the perfect couple but dark secrets are buried in the backyard.

4.title: Broken Heartland

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Indiana housewife Susan Grund is spoiled rotten, thanks to her husband Jim. Their marriage is the picture of perfection until Susan's sexual demands force Jim to withdraw. Susan begins an illicit affair that threatens both her lifestyle and her life.

5.title: American Nightmare

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Rose Keller's life changes when she answers an ad in a German newspaper. She jets off to Palm Beach and marries a millionaire 35 years her senior. Their relationship eventually fizzles, and 11 days after the divorce things turn deadly.

6.title: Murder for Hire

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Figure ice skater mom Sharon Voit resides in Golf, Illinois with her beautiful daughters and successful dentist husband. After years of happily ever after, Sharon starts to see cracks in her marriage. How far will she go to make things perfect again?

7.title: Third Time's the Charm

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Yvonne Stern is a domestic goddess, perfectly capable of balancing the needs of her family and her role as queen of the Houston social scene. Yvonne's husband, a prominent lawyer, has developed a deadly conflict of interest.

8.title: The Mad Scientist

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Michelle Nyce, a pretty girl from the Philippines, life is forever changed when she meets an American pen pal. Years later, Michelle grows restless and begins an affair with her gardener. Torn between two loves, will the truth turn Michelle's life deadly?

9.title: The Truth Hurts

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Life is just peachy for Jennifer Corbin, but when her husband becomes too controlling, she seeks out a cyber affair. Jennifer wants out of her marriage, but her world begins to unravel and her secrets are revealed.

10.title: Upper Eastside Shootout

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Wealthy housewife Barbara Kogan is the toast of New York society. With her business tycoon husband George, she enjoys an extravagant life. But when her husband leaves her for a younger woman, a bitter divorce ends with one of the Kogans' shot dead.

11.title: All Bets Are Off

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Sweet Doris Angleton is adored by all, but her hubby Houston's biggest bookie. Unfulfilled and lonely, Doris has an affair and now wants a divorce. Then threatens Bob's empire to get what she wants. But someone makes a bad bet and pays a deadly price.

12.title: Milkshake Murder

episode of.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Nancy Kissel projects quite an expensive image of perfection. But when a private investigator begins unraveling this housewife's dirty little secrets, someone winds up dead.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Behind their picket-fences they appear the picture of absolute perfection, but when the sugary façade begins to crack, down come the walls of their country club fairytales. From salacious affairs, to nasty divorces, the grass isn't always greener on the other side.
imdb.title: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives
akas: Secret Lives of Stepford Wives (United States)
plot: Behind their picket-fences they appear the picture of absolute perfection, but when the sugary façade begins to crack, down come the walls of their country club fairytales. From salacious affairs, to nasty divorces, the grass isn't always greener on the other side.
